stateDiagram

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

state REGULAR {

        PICKUP

        PICKUP : PICKUP

        PICKUP : enter / #123; sequence_start(SSI_PICKUP)#59; #125;

        MOVE_LEFT

        MOVE_LEFT : MOVE_LEFT

        MOVE_LEFT : enter / #123; sequence_start(SSI_MOVE_LEFT)#59; #125;

        FEED

        FEED : FEED

        FEED : enter / #123; sequence_start(SSI_FEED)#59; #125;

        PUSH_FOOD

        PUSH_FOOD : PUSH_FOOD

        PUSH_FOOD : enter / #123; sequence_start(SSI_PUSH_FOOD)#59; #125;

        DROP_FOOD

        DROP_FOOD : DROP_FOOD

        DROP_FOOD : enter / #123; sequence_start(SSI_DROP_FOOD)#59; #125;

        CLEAN_KITCHEN

        CLEAN_KITCHEN : CLEAN_KITCHEN

        CLEAN_KITCHEN : enter / #123; sequence_start(SSI_CLEAN_KITCHEN)#59; #125;

        state "$initial_state" as REGULAR.(InitialState)

}

E_STOP

E_STOP : E_STOP

E_STOP : (enter, do) / #123; safe_machine()#59; #125;

E_STOP : enter / #123; speak("Well crap. What happened?")#59; #125;

REMIND_RESTART

REMIND_RESTART : REMIND_RESTART

REMIND_RESTART : enter / #123; speak("Please reset me.")#59; #125;

ROOT.(InitialState) --> REGULAR

REGULAR --> E_STOP : ANY_KEY

PICKUP --> MOVE_LEFT : do [is_sequence_complete()]

MOVE_LEFT --> FEED : do [is_sequence_complete()]

FEED --> PUSH_FOOD : do [is_sequence_complete()]

PUSH_FOOD --> DROP_FOOD : do [is_sequence_complete()]

DROP_FOOD --> CLEAN_KITCHEN : do [is_sequence_complete()]

REGULAR.(InitialState) --> PICKUP

E_STOP --> REMIND_RESTART : ANY_KEY [is_speaking_done()]

REMIND_RESTART --> REMIND_RESTART : ANY_KEY [is_speaking_done()]
Events
settings
